member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.SwaggerOptionsExtensions.SetCustomDocumentSerializer``1(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Swagger.SwaggerOptions,System.Object[])
member.summary: Sets a custom Swagger document serializer to use.
member.remarks: For the CLI tool to be able to use this, this needs to be configured for use in the service collection of your application.
member.typeparam: The type of the custom Swagger document serializer implementation.
member.param: The options to configure the serializer for.
The parameters to pass into the constructor of the custom Swagger document serializer implementation.
